solution_line_template: First find the time Mary spent downloading the Windows version: {mac_download_time} minutes * {windows_download_multiplier} = <<{mac_download_time}*{windows_download_multiplier}={windows_download_time}>>{windows_download_time} minutes

Then find the total time the audio glitches took: {audio_glitch_duration} minutes/glitch * {num_audio_glitches} glitches = <<{audio_glitch_duration}*{num_audio_glitches}={total_audio_glitch_time}>>{total_audio_glitch_time} minutes

Then add the video glitch time to find the total glitch time: {total_audio_glitch_time} minutes + {video_glitch_duration} minutes = <<{total_audio_glitch_time}+{video_glitch_duration}={total_glitch_time}>>{total_glitch_time} minutes

Then double that time to find the total glitch-free time: {total_glitch_time} minutes * {glitch_free_multiplier} = <<{total_glitch_time}*{glitch_free_multiplier}={total_glitch_free_time}>>{total_glitch_free_time} minutes

Then add the talking time to the download time to find the total time: {windows_download_time} minutes + {mac_download_time} minutes + {total_glitch_time} minutes + {total_glitch_free_time} minutes = <<{windows_download_time}+{mac_download_time}+{total_glitch_time}+{total_glitch_free_time}={total_time_spent}>>{total_time_spent} minutes
